items.label: Server Size Profiles
items.help: Pick simple sizes; details available in tooltips.

Essential.text: Fixed size for all users: Small (≈2 GB RAM, 1 CPU)

Advanced.text: T‑shirt sizing per user: Small (≈2 GB, 1 CPU), Medium (≈4 GB, 2 CPU), Large (≈16 GB, up to 4 CPU), X‑Large (≈64 GB, up to 16 CPU). Group-based allocations supported.
